title: World Coronavirus COVID-19 Vaccination Total
description: The number of COVID-19 vaccination doses administered in the World rose to 9976338443 as of Jan 27 2022. The total number of vaccination doses administered. This is counted as a single dose, and may not equal the total number of people vaccinated, depending on the specific dose regime (e.g. people receive multiple doses). If a person receives one dose of the vaccine, this metric goes up by 1. If they receive a second dose, it goes up by 1 again. This page includes a chart with historical data for World Coronavirus Vaccination Total.
author: Our World in Data
